Portfolio Project

This is a deep dive into the website itself.

Description

This portfolio has been a project i have wanted to do ever since i first learned web design in College. Creating my own portfolio from scratch to act as not only a platform to display my work but a platform that demonstrates my work. To create the initial website i followed a tutorial "TraversyMedia Modern Portfolio" on Youtube and then expanded on what i had learned from it. Learning how to use grid template layouts and the incredibly useful scss language to compile the css code.
